infoPlist.NSCameraUsageDescription: This app needs access to camera to take photos for sharing your surrogacy journey.
infoPlist.NSPhotoLibraryUsageDescription: This app needs access to photo library to select photos for sharing your surrogacy journey.

plugins.photosPermission: The app accesses your photos to let you share them in your surrogacy journey posts.
plugins.cameraPermission: The app accesses your camera to let you take photos for your surrogacy journey posts.
